name: Snow Mercy!
description:
"Snow Mercy!" is a couch multiplayer game we made during the Jingle Game Jam 2020, organized by the Yogscast (go check them out, they are awesome). We worked in a team of 2 and used Unity.

To play this game, you'll need:

- one to three victims to play with;

- gamepads for everyone (one player can use the keyboard);

- some patience since the game is very much a prototype rn.

Hope you enjoy and thanks for checking out our page! :3
